In the intersection scenario, the ego vehicle exhibits a braking maneuver while maintaining a straight trajectory. The road conditions show no temporary changes with special lane markings. The traffic density is low (5 vehicles in the vicinity). Two adversarial vehicles are present: 
1) Vehicle [1] positioned at the rear of the ego vehicle demonstrates aggressive speeding behavior (speed increase: 10.93 m/s)
2) Vehicle [2] located on the right side engages in dangerous tailgating (following distance: 0.85 m). 
This scenario is reconstructed from the [HighD] dataset, specifically from the recording segment 'vehicle_tracks_000_trajectory_set_109.json'.

2) Adversary [2] following closely behind the ego vehicle, demonstrating delayed reaction (1.44s) followed by sudden braking. This scenario is reconstructed from real-world driving data [vehicle_tracks_000_trajectory_set_115.json] in the brake dataset.
